channel.title: How can I make my shop NPCs not be attackable?
channel.description:
Ok, I created a shop that has Dharok standing by the fountain in varrock. The only problem is, I can't figure out how to get rid of the attack option and put in a trade one.
Any help is appreciated :)

item.title: How can I make my shop NPCs not be attackable?
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Goddess, nope, you can make him un-mageable also, tut on it on the first few pages [if someone need’s it].

item.title: How can I make my shop NPCs not be attackable?
item.dc:creator: @Goddess Goddess
item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

i dont think you can change his options…lol. and people could just mage him anyways. i had to set things where if people were in certain areas they couldnt use spells or attack. aka the shop area.
